description: NÆR App is a youth participation web app with communities, chat, map-based proposals, swipe voting (Tinder-style), gamification (XP system, levels, rewards), and admin tools. AI features include community matching, proposal improvement, swipe card analysis, and content moderation. N.A.B.O Website is a corporate website for Next-Gen AI Tech Solutions focused on people-centered innovation for neighborhoods and local communities.
